name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:37261/?a=hkZ8bTAK4r0LayxDru2LoYJQJOpVUJrswSB8utWg3oq2KMKgf1ZFhVuq7JpIJ2sqWhMpWv_OVDIpTZaP5jFDY8Z0EwoD9uOd HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:45241/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
